summary: A sturdy player home with its own ore mine. This player home is geared more towards warriors.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Description[/b]
Tucked away between two glaciers rests Fort Ironcrag, a once prosperous ore mine of Winterhold.....


Greetings and welcome to my first Elder Scrolls Skyrim mod! While my inexperience may show in some areas, I hope you will enjoy this small contribution to the excellent Nexus modding community! This mod has all the bells and whistles you could expect from a player home, including navmesh, with the exception of an alchemy station. If there's enough demand, I will look into adding one in the future.

There's something of a boss waiting for you outside the fort, so be ready for a fight! You'll find Fort Ironcrag just west of Journeyman's Nook. If you're interested in some of the home's history, check out the Journal on the nightstand!

[b] Version 1.3 Update[/b]

After spending a lot of time unsuccessfully trying to get the watchtower's navmesh to work, I've chosen to replace the tower entirely. The new tower offers considerably more than the prior one, and I'm pleased to announce its navmesh works splendidly. Also included in this latest release is a safe hidden behind the left weapon plaque in the master bedroom. I've also polished the entry way separating the enchanting area and the mead hall. I hope you'll enjoy the improvements.
author: Kraeten
